main event: Two unidentified objects were observed at Lookout Mountain, Oregon, with speeds equivalent to 2-3 aircraft, described as two ovals with pointed ends and blue-green lights, disappearing behind the mountain.
interesting points: The observation duration was noted to be 2 years,Objects were described as having blue-green lights that appeared to be exhaust,The report suggested no aircraft were in the area during the sighting,The sighting was evaluated as a meteor with no material evidence found,There were erratic control maneuvers noted of an object seen in a separate instance.
sighted object: two oval-shaped objects with blue-green lights
witness description: Security observer from the Oregon Highway Department
